document.heading: Housing Production Trust Fund Stabilization Amendment Act of 2008

history.narrative: Law 17-365, the “Housing Production Trust Fund Stabilization Amendment Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-943 which was referred to the Committee on Housing and Public Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 18, 2008, and December 16, 2008, respectively. Approved without the signature of the Mayor on January 23, 2009, it was assigned Act No. 17-700 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-365 became effective on March 25,
